intro: Garnotia solitaria, commonly known as the solitary garnet, is a flowering plant native to the mountainous regions of South America. Its unique coloration and habitat make it a subject of interest for botanists and horticulturists. Due to its limited distribution, it is considered a rare and endangered species in its native range.
